title: Panama to Rule on Fate of Shuttered Copper Mine in June
description: Panama expects to decide in the coming months whether to restart a vast mine that has become one of the biggest uncertainties in the global copper market.
content: Panama expects to decide in the coming months whether to restart a vast mine that has become one of the biggest uncertainties in the global copper market.
